#summary Overview of Ajax support provided by ClickClick.

= Ajax =

The Click Framework does not provide direct support for Ajax components. As Ajax is very useful for certain use cases, !ClickClick provides out-of-the-box server side Ajax support through [http://code.google.com/p/clickclick/source/browse/trunk/clickclick/core/src/net/sf/click/ClickServlet2.java ClickServlet2].
